mapper.select: select max(MAINID) as max_Id from cqwu_building
mapper.insert:
insert into cqwu_building( MAINID, BUILDINGCODE, BUILDINGNAME, CAMPUSCODE, TYPE_, TOTALFLOORS, STATE_, ISVALID, ISDELETED
) values ( #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{DM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SZWZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lx_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ISVALID}, #{ISDELETED} )
